movies.Title: Avatar
movies.Plot: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
movies.Actors: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver

movies.Title: Moana
movies.Plot: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.
movies.Director: Ron Clements, John Musker, Don Hall
movies.Actors: Auli'i Cravalho, Dwayne Johnson, Rachel House

movies.Title: Click
movies.Plot: A workaholic architect finds a universal remote that allows him to fast-forward and rewind to different parts of his life. Complications arise when the remote starts to overrule his choices.
movies.Actors: Adam Sandler, Kate Beckinsale, Christopher Walken

movies.Title: Big Daddy
movies.Plot: A lazy law-school grad adopts a kid to impress his girlfriend, but everything doesn't go as planned and he becomes the unlikely foster father.
movies.Actors: Adam Sandler, Joey Lauren Adams, Jon Stewart

movies.Title: Transformers
movies.Plot: An ancient struggle between two Cybertronian races, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a teenager.
movies.Actors: Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, Josh Duhamel
